full_summary:
### Invitation to Qualify for Canadian Dental Care Program
#### Project Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites vendors to participate in an Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) for the Canadian Dental Care Program (CDCP). The program aims to provide dental care services to approximately 7 to 9 million Canadians.

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: WS3591046501
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3591046501
* **Publication Date**: October 28, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 5, 2022, 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: March 31, 2023

#### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: None
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada

#### Contracting Entity

* **Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada

#### End-User Entities

* **Name**: Department of Health (HC)
* **Address**: Address Locator 0900C2, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K9, Canada

#### Contact Information

* **Name**: Brianna Chalmers (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: [brianna.chalmers@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:brianna.chalmers@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Notice

This Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) seeks to pre-qualify up to three suppliers to collaborate with Canada in providing dental care services to Canadians. Interested vendors must submit their supporting documentation and bid submission on December 5, 2022, by 2:00 PM EST. Bids submitted after this date will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

#### Additional Information

Access the ITQ on Ariba Discovery at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14492533?extsite=MTQ0OTI1MzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14492533?extsite=MTQ0OTI1MzNfQU4wMTQ4N
